Articles.Content:
I posted the BC-304 the other day, that thread got into a discussion about people wanting an SGA, SG:1 Puddle Jumper:

This is my secondary shots of the ship in the configuration to pass through the gate.

Its in 2 Pieces (Cockpit and Rear at the moment so you can build it in KSP). Docking port and Extendable drive pods to follow
Wow, that's looking really good already. Yessir, looking forward to this more and more!
If you can make this a one-piece component... I would outfit ALL my long-range vessels with these. Any plans for the engine? In the show, they had SSTO capability, with fuel to spare.
I'm still working on this I'm working on the engine pods (I'm not really good at the animations so I'm having to learn how to do it).
Cool, I'll be keeping an eye on it.

If you can make this a one-piece component... I would outfit ALL my long-range vessels with these. Any plans for the engine? In the show, they had SSTO capability, with fuel to spare.

You could always weld them.

You could always weld them.

How do you weld parts in KSP?

How do you weld parts in KSP?

Use multiple MODEL nodes with appropriate position and rotation.

Compilation of modding links

If possible:

Openable rear end, with custom Kerbal seats that can be added or removed, making a cargo version or a shuttle both possible.

Either way, STARGATE!!!

I wonder if its possible to make make a plugin that makes a Stargate function as a stargate. ie. A kerbal walks through a stargate at KSC then walks out he otherside on say laythe where a second stargate was previously landed by the player.
